meanings.sent1: The knobblier surface of the rock made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: The tree trunk was knobblier than the smooth branches.
meanings.sent3: The knobblier potato in the bag looked like a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her knobblier fingers danced across the piano keys with precision.
meanings.sent5: The knobblier texture of the fabric reminded her of a bumpy road.

meanings.sent1: The knobblier tree stump was harder to remove than the others.
meanings.sent2: His knobblier knees made it challenging to kneel for long periods.
meanings.sent3: The knobblier puzzle piece was the last one to fit into place.
meanings.sent4: The knobblier path led them through a maze of obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The knobblier handle provided a better grip for her to hold onto.
